summary: TAKATA RECALL - MY SON DRIVES THIS VEHICLE AND WE JUST BOUGHT IT.   IT IS VERY SCARY TO THINK THAT THE AIR BAG INSTALLED TO SAVE HIS LIFE COULD TAKE IT.   WE DON'T HAVE AN EXTRA CAR FOR HIM TO DRIVE.  WE WOULD NOT HAVE BOUGHT IT IF WE KNEW AND THE DEALER PROBABLY KNEW.   MY HUSBAND DRIVES A TOYOTA TACOMA THAT HAS THE SAME PROBLEM.   I FIGURED I'LL JUST DEAL WITH IT RIGHT AWAY AND WAS TOLD THAT THE NEW AIRBAGS WILL NOT BE AVAILABLE UNTIL THE END OF 2017.  MY SON IS A NEW DRIVER, THIS WILL MAKE IT THE LONGEST WORRISOME 5-6 MONTHS.
